itemDisplayName: Import VHD Blob from a Blob URI
description: Deploying Virtual Machines based on specialized disk images requires to import VHD files into a Storage Account. In case the source is a Blob and you got the URI with a SAS Token ready for the transfer, this ARM template allows to import as a Blob into an existing Blob Container of a Storage Account with ease.
summary: Import VHD Blob from a Blob URI
